named-query.name: findUserTremnByEmailAndPassword
named-query.query: select u from UserTremn u where u.password = :pPassword and u.email = :pEmail

named-query.name: searchContact
named-query.query: select c from Contact c order by c.firstName, c.lastName

named-query.name: searchContactByFistNameOrLastNameOrCity
named-query.query: select distinct c from Contact c where c.firstName like :pName or c.lastName like :pName or c.address.addressCity like :pCityName order by c.firstName, c.lastName

named-query.name: findContactByEmailPrincipal
named-query.query: select c from Contact c where c.emailPrincipal = :pEmailPrincipal

named-query.name: findProductByName
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.name = :pName

named-query.name: searchProduct
named-query.query: select p from Product p order by p.name

named-query.name: searchProductByFlagActive
named-query.query: select p from Product p where p.flagActive = :pFlagActive order by p.name

named-query.name: findEventByName
named-query.query: select e from Event e where e.name = :pName
